name: Sunny Hipster
description:
Super cute hipster. Made in high quality soft cotton fabrics.

Made to order in all sizes listed below.

Please indicate your size when you order!

SIZE CHART
******************************************************************

name: Lacy Lola halter bra
description:
Cute underwired halter bra in a beautiful black lace and red lacy trim. Halter strap is adjustable. Bra closure in the back. The sides of the bra have been reinforced with powernet for extra support.

Made to order in the following sizes:

US-sizes: 
-32AA, 32A, 32B
-34AA, 34A, 34B
-36AA, 36A, 36B
-38AA, 38A, 38B

EU-sizes: 
-70A, 70B, 70C
-75A, 75B, 75C
-80A, 80B, 80C
-85A, 85B, 85C

If you are unsure about your bra size, please follow my simple instructions to calculate your bra size: http://queenblingerie.blogspot.com/2008/03/calculate-your-bra-size.html

This bra is only suited for the sizes mentioned above, not for larger sizes!

Please contact me if you have any questions.
